title: An Æthiopian historie written in Greeke by Heliodorus: very vvittie and pleasaunt, Englished by Thomas Vnderdoune. With the argumente of euery booke, sette before the whole vvoorke
author: Heliodorus, of Emesa.
publisher: By Henrie VVykes, for Fraunces Coldocke, dwellinge in Powles Churcheyarde, at the signe of the greene Dragon,
notes: Running title reads: The Æthiopian history of Heliodorus. ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
